Riptide emerged from the water that he was hiding in.  Unfortunatley, he 
needed to get used to his beast mode so he couldn't go anywhere as a fish.
"Hmmm, what to do?*Thinks* Vehicle mode!"
Riptide changes into an ATV and he jets off.  After some parsects traveled, 
Riptide stopped.  He saw a strange object.  It wasn't natural.  He thought 
it must've been a base.
"Riptide to this base.  Do you hear me?"
Riptide waited for a response.
